nodes.text: Hrchek Kal Fas was a male Saurin from Durkteel. He was a droid trader and the cousin of Sai'torr Kal Fas, and wisely kept his bodyguard with him at all times. He was a patron in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina when Obi-Wan Kenobi took Luke Skywalker there. He saw C-3PO in the cantina and tried to follow him, but lost him in the busy streets of Mos Eisley.
Although uncredited, Hrchek Kal Fas was played by Laurie Goode.
